mapper.select: select a.*,b.*,c.* from worker a left join department b on a.did = b.did left join role c on a.rid = c.rid where a.waccount = #{account}
mapper.update: update worker set wpass =#{password} where waccount=#{account};
mapper.select: select a.rid,a.rname,c.mid,d.mid,c.mname 'firstname',d.mname 'secondname',d.mpath from role a left join role_menu_relation b on a.rid = b.rid left join menu c on c.mid =b.mid inner join menu d on d.mparentid = c.mid where a.rid =#{rid} ;

select f.* from guide_check a left join order_package_relation b on a.goid =b.goid left join package c on b.packid = c.packid left join package_project_relation d on d.packid = c.packid left join project f on f.proid = d.proid left join patient h on h.pidentitynumber = b.pidentitynumber where a.gcid =#{gcid} and a.pcardnumber = h.pcardnumber ;

select h.* from guide_check a left join order_package_relation b on a.goid =b.goid left join package c on b.packid = c.packid left join package_project_relation d on d.packid = c.packid left join project f on f.proid = d.proid left join project_item_relation g on g.proid =d.proid left join item h on h.iid =g.iid left join patient i on i.pidentitynumber = b.pidentitynumber where a.gcid =#{gcid} and d.proid =#{proid} and a.pcardnumber = i.pcardnumber ;
